description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

CertificationObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

CertificationObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

CertificationObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: The Reference ID that specifies a Certification.

Certification_Data.description: The name or type of the certification.

Certification_IssuerObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

CountryObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

CountryObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Certification_Data.description: Any specialties which are recommended for this certification.
When selected, the specialty prompt displayed to workers adding certifications to their worker profile will be restricted to the mapped specialties.
Indicates whether or not the worker holding this certification may have the exam date and score fields enabled.
Indicates whether or not this certification is active in the system and is available for users to choose from prompts.
The number of records in the system that refers to this certification.

validation.validation: You must first enable Specialties for Certifications using the Maintain Skills and Experience Setup task.
[specialty] is inactive. Specify an active specialty or activate this specialty on the Edit Specialty task.
